events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on Main Street, resulting in noticeable damage to the front bumper.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the description mentioning a car collision and vehicle damage.
An agent was assigned to the claim to assist the customer through the next steps and provide timely updates about the process.
The claimant was formally notified that the auto accident claim has been received and is being processed accordingly.
Requested the customer provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and any repair estimates to proceed with investigation.
Customer submitted all required documentation including images of the collision damage and official police accident report.
The claims investigation team began reviewing all submitted documents and contacted involved parties to verify details.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident circumstances and extent of vehicular damage with no discrepancies found.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover the repair costs and associated expenses based on investigation results.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the responsiveness of the process.
The claim was officially approved for the proposed settlement amount after all verifications were satisfactorily completed.
Payment was successfully issued to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover vehicle repair costs as per the approved claim.
The auto accident claim was formally closed following payment issuance and final confirmation from the customer.
All claim documents and investigation records were archived in accordance with company policy for future reference.
